extension.description: Hacked together add-on to try and solve some very annoying Jellyfin for Kodi problems: - Resume point is almost always wrong - randomly from some seconds to several minutes prior to actual resume point - Resume point will randomly be cleared and playback will go back to the start - Kodi doesn't display subtitles without a long delay (https://github.com/jellyfin/jellyfin-kodi/issues/35, https://github.com/xbmc/xbmc/issues/21086 etc)
